RSA Fernet

	
caution!

		
This module uses "wipe" and erases stuff!

		
		[xonsh] 
		# [xonsh] docker run -v /path_inside_host:/path_inside_container -it ubuntu /bin/bash 
	
		
	
	
important

		Make sure a backup of the ACC is encrypted,
		not the "ACC" itself.

	
	
structure

	
		ACC -> This is the open folder
		
		
				
		
		
		
	
	
	
steps

		
    
		
  1. 
			
    Create the enzymes folder.
    
			
    
		
			[xonsh] movies_ogv rsa-fernet--create-enzymes-folder --folder "ACC/ENZYMES"
			
			
    
		
    2. 
		
  2. 
			
    Clone the enzymes folder.
    
			
    
		
			[xonsh] movies_ogv rsa-fernet--clone-enzymes --de "ACC/ENZYMES" --to "ENZYMES/1"
		
			
			
    
		
    3. 
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		

			








	
thoughts

	
		"""
		COLD		::			HOT
		OPEN		::			CLOSED
		DAY 		::			NIGHT
				
				PHYSICAL WALLETS:
					NIGHT WALLET &
					DAY WALLET
		"""
